short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract, share and analyze real-time, structured intelligence directly from the web and PDFs to identify critical business problems.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract, share, and analyze real-time, structured intelligence directly from the web, PDF documents, Office and Gmail to capture a precise view of any situation, accelerating results through smarter, faster decision-making.

Groopit, the only AI-powered problem-solving platform that combines real-time intelligence from employees with transparent, adaptive AI to help business leaders make faster, smarter decisions, now empowers the extraction and sharing of precise intelligence directly from the web using Chrome and Edge browsers.
Dramatically simplifying how employees share and use human intelligence — competitive intel, product feedback, sales insights, voice of the customer quotes, and more — the Groopit Browser Extension allows users to extract key data points from any web page with one simple click, and to group and analyze them by initiative, topic or problem area.

By making it easy to capture high-quality, precise intelligence directly from web pages, PDF documents, Office or Gmail in a browser, Groopit empowers organizations to develop clarity around any business situation, accelerating business outcomes and more rapidly identifying, diagnosing and solving problems.
The Groopit Browser Extension joins the Groopit App for Teams, Groopit Add-In for Outlook, Groopit App for Slack, Groopit App for Salesforce, and the Groopit iOS and Android apps to deliver unprecedented cross-functional visibility that empowers decision-makers with clarity across every altitude of an organization.
This high-quality, real-time intelligence is then analyzed by Groopit’s advanced AI capabilities to meticulously extract patterns, anomalies, and highlights. Unlike other AI solutions, Groopit AI produces insights guaranteed free from hallucinations and with full source transparency. Leader-defined data models determine the precise data Groopit AI extracts and analyzes to generate actionable insights, while Groopit users maintain final approval of all information AI shares, engendering the organization-wide trust in data that leads to better decision-making.

Groopit provides business leaders with the agility to zero in on problems and opportunities quickly and inexpensively. Outsmart competitors. Deliver outstanding products. Accelerate revenue growth. Reduce inbound call volume. Reduce quality issues. Remove sales inefficiencies. Eliminate process delays. Fix d-sat drivers. Now you can solve complex problems with real-time data from frontline employees, using the systems they’re already using.

Groopit provides advanced privacy, SOC 2 Type II certification, PCI compliance and HIPAA-enabled data protection. In order to install the Groopit Browser Extension, you must have an existing Groopit subscription. To learn more and get started visit groopit.co.
